name: A Game about the thing
description:
This is a short exploration game. You play as a female cyborg Rin (リン). Your only objective is to feel weird and reach the end of the map.

Selection of features:

  • Static environment, where you cannot interract witch anything.
  • Highly atmospheric music, which might be cosidered as depressive.
  • Triangulated pictures of food containing dancing hot dog.
  • Pipes everywhere.

On high school, we had to make a project to pass it. I've made up an idea of relaxing atmospheric game in forest. As you can see, things quite didn't go according to the plan. At the end, i've created this . . thing . . yeah.

If you wanna support me, you can comment or you can buy some of my games. Thank you very much.

That's all, thank you for visiting.

Credits
  • Picture Daydream from a great artist NanoMortis.
  • Skybox is generated in Space 3D tool, whis is made by Rye Terrel.
  • Confetti sound comes from freesound.org user vewiu.
  • (I Am) Climbing on Air, Better Way and Changing Reality by a great composer Kai Engel.
  • 71017, Feeling and Floating by another great composer Borrtex.
Changelog

1.1.1 - May 2018

  • Just fixed some grammar issue.

1.1 - May 2018

  • Changed language from czech to english.
  • Minor bug fixes.
  • Settings are now remembered through restarts of the game.
  • Confetti!

1.0 - March 2018

  • This game was made, yaay.
